mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWSBSSGMT (CASHFLOWSBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, RPTDATE, SHEETYEAR, SHEETTYPE, SHEETTYPEDIVIDE, AUDITFIRMNAME, AUDITORNAME, AUDITTIME, CIMOC, RPTDATECODE,REPORTFLAG ) values (#{CashFlowsBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EntName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EntCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EntCertNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SheetYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SheetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SheetTypeDivide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AuditFirmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AuditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AuditTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Cimoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWSBSSGMT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTNAME = #{EntName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTCERTTYPE = #{EntCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTCERTNUM = #{EntCertNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATE = #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHEETYEAR = #{SheetYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHEETTYPE = #{SheetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHEETTYPEDIVIDE = #{SheetTypeDivide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITFIRMNAME = #{AuditFirmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITORNAME = #{AuditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITTIME = #{AuditTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CIMOC = #{Cimoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATECODE = #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{Cimoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CASHFLOWSBSSGMTSEQNO = #{CashFlowsBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CASHFLOWSBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, RPTDATE, SHEETYEAR, SHEETTYPE, SHEETTYPEDIVIDE, AUDITFIRMNAME, AUDITORNAME, AUDITTIME, CIMOC, ORG_CODE RPTDATECODE,REPORTFLAG,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWSBSSGMT where CASHFLOWSBSSGMTSEQNO = #{CashFlowsBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select CASHFLOWSBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, RPTDATE, SHEETYEAR, SHEETTYPE, SHEETTYPEDIVIDE, AUDITFIRMNAME, AUDITORNAME, AUDITTIME, CIMOC, RPTDATECODE,REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWSBSSGMT
select count(1) from PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWSBSSGMT bb where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWSBSSGMTM (CASHFLOWSBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, RPTDATE, SHEETYEAR, SHEETTYPE, SHEETTYPEDIVIDE, AUDITFIRMNAME, AUDITORNAME, AUDITTIME, CIMOC, RPTDATECODE,REPORTFLAG,etl_date ) select CASHFLOWSBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, RPTDATE, SHEETYEAR, SHEETTYPE, SHEETTYPEDIVIDE, AUDITFIRMNAME, AUDITORNAME, AUDITTIME, CIMOC, RPTDATECODE,'0' ,to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWSBSSGMT where CASHFLOWSBSSGMTSEQNO = #{CashFlowsBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
